resources.string: Welcome! In order to continue with the game, you have to allow the location permissions and enable your bluetooth. If you wonder why location permissions, it\'s because the android needs this permissions in order to return the list with the visible bluetooth devices.
Please pair manually your phone with your opponent\'s phone and then continue with the game. Tap the "Open Bluetooth Settings" button in order to pair your device and then tap the "continue" button.
One of you has to be the host of the game and the other one the guest. Please choose one option (you should not choose the same option).
Waiting host to accept the join request…
Waiting guest to join the game…
You can play the game now! Enjoy!
Something went wrong while trying to establish a BT connection.
